Reviews.Author: Des
Reviews.Content: Sam's Club did a very good job at organizing today's Door Busting Deals. There were quite a few people lined up pretty early this morning and I we were about in the middle of the long line. Once the line got quite long after we've been there about a half hour before they opened up the doors to the store a couple of the Sam's Club staff came out and one-by-one asked us what deals we were interested in.  Once we informed the Sam's Club staff of the deals we were given tags of the items in the store and directions to where those items would be located. Once we were given the tags you were instructed to go to the counter, if there wasn't a line for that item, give the Sam's Club associate the tag, the Sam's Club associate will grab the item you want to purchase, then another available associate will take your item of purchase and walk you to the first available check out counter.  Some Door Busting items had long lines but if you didn't have a tag you were advised that the item was 'Sold Out'. Sam's Club was very organized to avoid any disputes or physical altercations in regards to the deals we were quite impressed. I'd recommend coming here for good customer service and good deals (when advertised). Lol

Reviews.Author: Brooke
Reviews.Content: This Sams club is quiet and not as busy as the other locations. I like that they have different item selection from Costco. However Costcos food court beats them out of the water. We've gotten old pizza and chicken sandwiches and old hot dogs a few times. Lesson learned never buying from food court here but overall it's pretty quick to get in and out here and the staff is nice.

Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I have been going to this SAMs club for several years. The have many bulk items at decent prices. I compared a few items and it is worth getting at SAMs vs. a grocery store.  Friendly service and not usually a line

Reviews.Author: Jodi
Reviews.Content: Wonderful customer service at Sam's Club on Pecos & Tropicana in Las Vegas, Nevada. I placed an order online last night to be picked up today at 2PM. I received an email this morning around 5am saying my order was ready. I arrived at Sam's club about 2:15pm this afternoon and checked in. Upon trying to checkout, the manager was unable to find my order. He even went looking for himself. I am not sure what happened but the order was never pulled. I ended up getting the order myself. The manager, CHRIS, apologized numerous times and gave me a $10 gift card for my troubles. I understand glitches and whatnot happen and I accept that. However, without asking for compensation, CHRIS offered it. It  is refreshing to have a unpleasant situation bettered without having to ask for it. Keep up the good work and THANK YOU CHRIS FOR YOUR HARD WORK!!!

Reviews.Author: Bart
Reviews.Content: Management of these stores could take a lesson from Costco. Costco's stores are so full of people that you can't move. Sam's basically empty. Reasons: 1. Costco provides riding cars. About 50 per store. Tough to walk around these huge stores. Sams has 3. Horrible management. 2. People standing in line while employees stand in front chatting. 6 or 8  girls all in a group standing around talking, while, customers stand in line. Unacceptable. 3. Costco provides boxes to haul out your purchases. Sam's has nothing. They treat the customers like dirt.  4. Costco is easy to get out. Sams has 1 little old lady at the door checking purchases and she has to hand out coupons for future visits. Bullshit. Get people out the door and quit screwing around.   Fire the senior management and bring in managers that know how to satisfy the public!!!!!

Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I think this may be the cheapest gas in Las Vegas! I recently got a free Sam's Club membeship with my AmEx, so when I opened GasBuddy and saw the price at this Sam's Club, I took a drive over after hitting the airport to check my PO Box. I got scolded by the kid working for pulling in the wrong way, which was hilarious to me. I saw the arrows, but it was too late. Anyway, I'm sure I'll be back here a few more times this year untl my membership expires.

Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: Terrible service from the Supervisor on duty, Chris.Simply wanted to add a person to my account and it wasn't possible. I'll continue to avoid this ghetto location and use my Costco membership instead.  This is the second time he used poor judgment

Reviews.Author: Darlene
Reviews.Content: Not in the fanciest neighborhood, but this location has items that I have found for myself that the other Sams Club doesn't carry.  This is where I found a large pack of Portuguese Sausage, the Hawaiian kine :).  Jesse N.  was ecstatic to see that it was his favorite brand too.    I shop at this location often because its fairly close to where I work.  I sometimes order pizza for my employees from here.  I love their pizzas.  If you ask nicely, they can even throw on some extra toppings.  I even come here to pick up some meat and chicken to bbq.  This location is the one that has boneless/skinless chicken thighs.  Its almost a rarity to find that now a days.    Other than that, in comparison to other Warehouse Bulk stores, easy to shop around, if you take the time, you might see specials that they are offering on certain items, always is nice to come in when they are giving samples too.  Plus I've always met friendly staff here.  Shop away

Reviews.Author: Scottyboy
Reviews.Content: Worst customer service experience ever, avoid Audrey at customer service counter at all costs.  Took about a half hour to return one item, got major attitude and she recruited another customer who got in my face screaming.  Another lady employee stepped in and did the return. In less than two minutes, saving the day and stopped me from cancelling my membership on the spot.  Josh the manager was very helpful and apologetic and seemed to genuinely care.  One star review was for Audrey only.  Will not return to this location.

Reviews.Author: June
Reviews.Content: I always go to this store for over 10 years and it's because they have a milk powder/formula for my kids, but recently they don't have that product so I tried to call the next week if they have it yet but they stop caring that anymore and I tried to ask if which sams club of town caring that milk but the lady on the phone hang up on me for no reason. I'm disappointed

Reviews.Author: Localvegas
Reviews.Content: I love, love coming to Sams Club. Um as long as I don't have to go to the customer service area, they are always unfriendly and a few times just rude. But the cashiers have been really friendly!

Reviews.Author: Maddilee
Reviews.Content: If just Sam's club, nothing special to really discuss...lol. Their pizzas are very good, cheap prices, I love the deli section, as well as their wines.  Like Walmart, they only have like two lanes open and 50 people waiting to get checked out...

Reviews.Author: Margret
Reviews.Content: According to my husband this is the best one, and not all the SC stores carry the same products (which I find really weird, but whatever). We've gone to this one several times. Greetings and promotions (gotta show your membership card) upon entering the store, which I've come to name  the swapmeet hustle.  You know, the  Can I ask you a question?  or  Do you know about....?  They've come to be a reality now whenever you go shopping at a mall setting (it's so annoying).  The layout is easy enough- it's a warehouse, basically. The items are well-stocked. It's a clean store. The employees are helpful (when asking about a product you don't see on the floor) and nice.    Sunday was our most recent visit. Samples are the weekend usual ritual here. We sampled soup, organic fruit and beef jerky. There was much more, too like, toaster strudel and some others in the frozen food section.   The best prices are: the princess (disney- very yummy) seedless green grapes for $3.98, a 24 pk. pure life bottled water for $3.98, strawberries, 2 lbs. for $3.48, chicken sausage- a large pack with 3 rows, for $11.98 (hint: freeze the rows so you have it handy), sandwich thins, 18 pk. for $3.98. We don't buy a large amount of groceries here because we only shop for ourselves (2 people can't finish these large quantities of food items). But when we shop here, we do like what we get. It's hard to beat the prices on the items I just mentioned. You also show your membership card at checkout. Keep your receipt handy; on the way out, someone will check it off.   There is a cafe, which is also very popular, due to low prices. Even with their availability of seating (picnic tables), it's always a packed house.  Parking is not a problem for us. There is ample parking in front and as well as the side of the building.

Reviews.Author: Ramil
Reviews.Content: I always go to this Sam's Club because it's the closest one to me. Although all Sam's Club locations are pretty big, this one would probably be one of the smaller locations in comparison to the newer ones around town. They also do not carry all the products I've seen at the other locations. On a positive note it's not as busy here, which makes it easier to navigate through the store. Since their carts are huge you sometimes find yourself putting so much energy into pushing your cart trying not to bump into anyone, which is not the case here. Semi empty aisles make shopping ease free. The check out lines at the other locations seem to be longer than here . They're not as strict about only having 1 sample or kids having to be with their parents in order to have 1, which is something I encountered at the SERENE location. The thing I don't understand with all Sam's Clubs is that for credit cards they only accept discover and master card? I find that kind of odd maybe an issue with banking systems? Or they are trying to persuade their members to apply for the Sam's Club Discover card? Overall I will continue to come to this location just because it's convenient for me.

Reviews.Author: Mayra
Reviews.Content: I went 2 to 3 weeks ago with my sister in law to order a 2 tier wedding cake and 60 cupcakes. We asked questions and double checked that the cake would be ready for pick up on Sunday at 10am. GUESS WHAT? The cake nor the cupcakes were ready. And when my sister in law asked to talk to the manager she got the bakery manager who instead of trying to help an already very stressful situation, made it worse by having a crazy disrespectful attitude.  They gave me a cake but it was a piss poor job as far as what it looked like. No flowers because they didn't have anymore, the ribbon was jacked up.....it was no bueno.... And to top it off they even messed up the cupcakes. We asked for 30 chocolate and 30 white ended up with more chocolate than white. HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE  We ended up talking to a different manager (ONLY REASON I GAVE IT A STAR) who helped us out by comping the disaster of a cake but I can assure you that they have lost any future business from me.

Reviews.Author: Joey
Reviews.Content: For come reason this seems to be not up to par compared to Costco.  Everything just seems so...dead.  Luckily Sam's Club makes up for it with it's brown box pizza.  The three meat pizza for $9.00 is simply awesome.  One of my favorite places to go to for pizza.  Normally my work buys this pizza but normally I just walk into Sam's Club without a card and say I plan to get a card.  Which is true, I really do plan to get a card one day...  It wasn't really busy either, this is a decent place.    #3meatpizza #FTW

Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: Sams Club - Pecos is the old school Sams location in Vegas. It doesn't have gas pumps or car washes. Some people think the location can be sketchy as it's not Summerlin. But if you want to get in, get what you want and not fight a horde of people most of the time to do it, this is the location to shop at.   My family in one form or another has held a Sams Club membership since they opened their 2nd location in Missouri 30 years ago. Some gripes about Sams Club never change and certainly apply to the Pecos location. Checkout can be slow. They don't always restock the carts. And why do they make the cashiers lift every single flat of water out of the cart? Beyond all that this location isn't flashy but it's one of the better locations I've seen in 14 states. Why? The shelves are stocked, the place is clean, and while you may have to wait in a line or two the staff will help you if you need it.   (Tip: The WalMart Money Services ATM has a weird $300 limit for cash transactions while most other places are $400).   4 Stars.

Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: I'll state the obvious- the pizza at the food court is stellar. The deals in the store are usually better than elsewhere. My review here however, is not warranted by either of these. I would liked to pay compliment to Charlie at the food court. Guy was friendly, courteous, and was mindful of us. Without going into too much detail, the man took several subtle actions to make our visit much easier. Without seeking praise or recognition, he quietly raised the bar and soared on the customer service front. Good call, Sam's Club on finding Charlie. Thank you for restoring some faith in humanity.

Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: It's a great place for saving money on the things you use the most. Sadly, one of the employees that hands out samples was extremely mean to the kids on our first visit, so now they're afraid of her. I think more time should be spent on customer service training. Large businesses seem to think that it doesn't matter since people will come anyway, but they're wrong, something can always take their place.

Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: They finally corrected this Sam's Club with a much-needed remodeling.  Now it is just like all the other Sam's Clubs with the exception of a gas station, which is a drawback.  This Club is very nicely located, but may not have a large selection of parking.  This is also the first one in Vegas, built in 1991.

Reviews.Author: Jamison
Reviews.Content: I love the bulk items that SAMs has but they are following the path of other store when it comes to checking out.  You have 8 lanes that can be utilized but you only have 3 lanes open with huge lines.  It truly baffles me.  I'm here for 2 items and have to wait over 15 minutes to check out.  I guess this is what paying for a membership gets me.  It makes me wonder if paying for smaller bulk items and getting out of a store faster is worth the convenience.    On a good note I love the pizza and hot dogs here.  You get awesome deals on those

Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: Went on Sunday 2-21-16 at 4:30 PM to get some shopping done.  This Sam's Club is located on Pecos and Tropicana.  It's the closest one to my house and I like it because it's clean and always well stocked.  Check out lines are usually well staffed and most of the employees I've talked to are very friendly. We always hit up the snack bar for the outrageously cheap and tasty food.    I shopped for about 30 minutes and then I went to the checkout lane.  I checked out at 5:01 PM at checkout stand #10. The total seemed a bit high but I did have a cart full of crap so I let it go and headed out to my car and loaded my things.  I put my boy into his carseat and the total kept nagging at me so I pulled out the receipt and noticed they had charged me twice for a box of probiotics that I bought.   So I drag my baby back out of his carseat and head inside and go straight to customer service with the one box of medicine and my receipt.  I wait in line for about 20 minutes because there are a few people in front of me.  I finally get to the front and I tell the lady (the one who looks just like Old Gregg) what happened.  She calls the manager and the manager says they'll have to check the security tapes. *sigh* Okay, fine.   20 more minutes roll by and by this time I'm getting mildly irritated.  First they tried to rip me off, now they've made me wait 40 minutes to correct their own mistake and made me feel like some kind of criminal in the meantime.   Finally the manager calls up and gives the cashier the go-ahead to refund the money to my card.  She does the refund and then she asks why the box of medicine I brought in doesn't have a  door tag .  I guess the 90 year old dinosaur at the front door was supposed to give me some kind of sticker that indicates that I brought the product inside.  She said she'd call the manager to check the security footage to make sure I really brought it inside and didn't just pull it off the shelf and bring it over to customer service.    Now I am losing it.  On the inside I feel my skin peel away from my skull and fire shoots out of the sockets where my eyes used to be.  I let her know that I was not happy and I want to go home.  I'd been a pretty good sport up until that time.  The solution was that the manager could walk me to the front door in leiu of having a  door tag .    I've never been so humiliated and inconvenienced. This is exactly the type of whiny review that I hate reading but I had to.  *END RANT*

Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: Went here 4th of July weekend to buy some items with my friend, who was having a party at his house. This store, even though its big, is so unorganized....it was hard for us to find everything we were looking for...Hamburgers, hotdogs, the bread for both items, ketchup, mustard, relish...it was all scattered all over the place....it was great to buy in bulk, but damn....you need to put things together, that make sense to be together....oh well....maybe next time ill hit up a different store.....overall, we did find what we were looking for, only took us 2 hours!!

Reviews.Author: Tyler
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure how to review a discount club. Aren't they all the same? It is always clean here. The staff is always helpful. They usually have what I'm shopping for. I've never had any kind of negative experience here. What else can I say? I've gone here for years and will continue.

Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: I like this one much better than the one on Serene. The isles are much bigger, I didn't bump into anyone once!

Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: Just an ugly place.  Dirty, so-so deals, rude employees, bad parking, so-so produce.  I'm a Costco guy through and through and figured I'd give Sam's a try.  Not worth it.  I went thrice and won't be back.

Reviews.Author: Bev
Reviews.Content: I appreciated the professional & efficient assistance I received this morning in customer service from Roxanne & Shirley, keep up the great service. I was also able to order 4 large trays of mixed cookies to pick up fresh on Friday, this Sam's Club is awesome! Kudos to them for all they do, it's working!

Reviews.Author: Blue
Reviews.Content: We would not normally shop here but we got agift card so we went there yesterday, well we got all the things we needed and were going to check out and there are waaaaay to many employees working there, they were all standing around doing nothing the place was almost empty.anyway we put most of our stuff up on the belt and the checker says  i guess ill go find another cart so he leaves and comes back without a cart and says just push that one up here ill scan all the items in the cart fine...they had no boxes to put all of our items in wich was so annoying because we had alot of stuff that took us almost ten trips each geting the groceries in the house. Its a big store with lots of stuff why would they not have any boxes to put bought items in....

Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: Checkout lines were so long but they had the rug we came to buy. They need more than three checkout lines open at night.

Reviews.Author: Kay
Reviews.Content: Customer service is either a hit or miss. Greeters or card/receipt checkers are always unpleasant. Meat service and checkout (sometimes) customer service is great. Excellent quality on whole pizzas. Overall, a lot less busy than costco.

Reviews.Author: Debra
Reviews.Content: I love this location.   Okay, so it is not in the best neighborhood or in the prime location of town. But this Sam's Club is always clean, always has plenty of samples on the weekends, and has a great staff.  It is always the little things that mean the most. One visit we had bought a tray of cookies and as my hunny was rearranging the cart, the cookies spilled and fell out. The quickly cleaned it up and gave us a replacement, even though it was our fault.  Their markdown sections almost always carry some great treats. And if a manager is near by, don't be scared to ask for an additional markdown. You will most likely get it.   The greeters and receipt checkers are always so friendly and love-able. Most of their cashiers are on point and are fast and speedy.  They do take credit cards but Mastercard only. If your card is Visa it has to be run as debit.

Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: I love our local Sam's Club. This location in particular is not too busy especially during times when it seems to be busiest. At least compared to the other locations I've been at. My kids love it here too. Whose wouldn't after all the awesome samples the give.   We love getting hot dogs here. Cheap and so good!! I usually get the cesar salad which isn't bad at all for 4 bucks. Today I got a berry sundae yogurt thingy and ohhh my lanta!!! So good! Wasn't in the mood to share with my boys but I caved. Lol.   One more thing. We also checked out using the new Sam's Club app. So handy especially when the lines are long.   Any who. Check out this Sam's. No disappointments here

Reviews.Author: Vanessa
Reviews.Content: I enjoy this Sam's Club, great variety of many things as majority of Sam's Club do. The only thing that I was unpleasant with was my cashier at the food court. I had asked a few questions about prices and the food offered there, and she was getting aggravated that I was asking questions. I asked 2. When she turned around to get our frozen yogurt, she was super happy with your co worker. I was extremely annoyed with her attitude toward me.

Reviews.Author: Perla
Reviews.Content: Worst wait ever at member service counter. Every. Single. Time. I just wanted to get a membership. I don't think it's worth it. There should be a designated person to exclusively help new members.

Reviews.Author: Ceylina
Reviews.Content: We ordered a birthday cake for my daughter's 1st birthday. The baker spelled the word Birthday wrong, it was spelled bithday. I wanted everything to be perfect for her. I loved the cake tho. Hopefully, the next baker could spell.

Reviews.Author: Savina
Reviews.Content: Extremely unprofessional staff and rude supervisors will never go to another SAMs club again. Costco service far exceeds this and has much friendlier overall staff. Never come to this location.
